name: ScareWorld
description:
NOTE: the game only has 2 short levels, I don't have time to add anything else, because of some personal stuff, sorry.

Explore the factory filled with horrors in this 2D horror pixel game.

Controls: In the main menu use W and S to change the menu buttons, left click to select. In the game, W, A, S and D to move, left click to interact, right click change the flashlight range, middle click to turn the flashlight off, space to distract the creature.
